name: One Life (Beta)
description:
This is "One Life", my entry for the jam made in one day with Unity.

YOU ONLY HAVE ONE LIFE EVER! 

For real, if you die, you get a highscore, and that's it, you will never be able to play again.

Also Grass instantly kills you.

Also don't go too far away from the center or you also die instantly.

Also enemies instantly kill you on contact.

That's about it. Good luck!

CONTROLS

Keys W, A, S, D/Arrow Keys : Move 

Space Key : Jump (You can spam it!)

R : Reset The Game (In case you are stuck!)

Time to become the ultimate time master!

HOW I MADE THE GAME
